A man with medium skin tone, wearing a navy blue polo shirt, black pants, and blue shoes, with a dark watch on his wrist and black hair.
A female soldier wearing green tactical uniform, backpack, and black boots. Hair is tied back. She carries a utility vest and accessories.
A female soldier with light skin, wearing a black beanie, tactical vest, black shirt, pants, and boots, with a white scarf and communication gear.
A woman with medium skin, dark hair in a bun, wearing a dark V-neck shirt, light pants, and brown boots
A man wearing a gray suit, dark shirt, and brown shoes with short dark hair.
